timeline.bodyText: It will be good to add a comment here that LR simply replicates the streams and does not need it to be added to the transaction log
timeline.author: pankti-m

timeline.message:
CorfuStore option Tx Logging Disabled

LR does require TX Logging to be disabled on the standby site to avoid
generation of DCNs on replicated data and CorfuStore enforces it to be enabled.

timeline.bodyText: is the relation between data change notification and tx stream general to corfu?

replies.bodyText: not really, it's one use case (out of Corfu) but it can be used for any purpose. Just didn't know how to make it clear.. I've rephrased it, take a look and let me know if you think it still is confusing.
